EmailTemplate.name: Dealer Approval for Imp Project
EmailTemplate.subject: APPROVAL REQUESTED: Your VinSolutions Service
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!SFDC_520_Quote__c.Approval_Contact__c},
Congratulations on your new VinSolutions product!
Please click on the 'Activate My Account' link below. This will open a form for you to sign electronically giving VinSolutions authorization to activate your account.
http://www.clicktools.com/survey?iv=155xjs7e210eq&q1={!SFDC_520_Quote__c.Id}&q2={!SFDC_520_Quote__c.AccountId__c}&q3={!SFDC_520_Quote__c.Approval_ContactId__c}
We at VinSolutions appreciate your business and look forward to making this a success.
